Dear List,
For the obvious reasons, . . .  I am suddenly curious about blades of the
Nio School. It is listed as an example of the Yamato-den, but it seems like
an isolated group. Can any one give any guidance on its relative
importance. Likewise, it seems to have had a long history. Are there rules
of thumb for telling the difference between very old (Kamakura) blade from
those of - say - Nambokucho ago, or even newer.
Thanking you in advance,
Peter




Peter Bleed
